EmailTemplate.name: Case Notification Checkbox
EmailTemplate.subject: Please disregard this message
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Oops! Someone accidentally checked the "Send Notification Email" checkbox when reassigning a case.
Please delete this message. Our apologies for any inconvenience.
Did you know you can set up an Outlook rule to automatically send these messages to your Deleted Items folder? Simply open your Outlook and complete the following steps:
1. Go to File 2. Go to Manage Rules and Alerts 3. Under Email Rules, click New Rule 4. Choose "Move Messages with specific words in the subject to a folder" and click Next 5. Click on the specific words hyperlink and enter Please disregard this message 6. Click on the specified hyperlink and choose Deleted Items 7. Click Finish 8. Enjoy never seeing this message again
Thank you!
{!User.Name}
